short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks stonly popups from any website you want

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of stonly? This is the extension for you :)

This small snippet will hide stonly for the website you want, just click on the extension and press  "Hide stonly". Remember, this is url based!
